00026 const int DEFAULT_BITS_IN_LAU = 8;

00028 // struct constructor
00029 BusInterface::MonitorInterface::MonitorInterface(QDomNode& monitorNode):
00030                                                                 interfaceMode_(General::MONITOR),
00031                                                                 group_() {
00032         // get the interfaceMode attribute
00033         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = monitorNode.attributes();
00034         QString interfaceMode = attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00035                         "spirit:interfaceMode")).nodeValue();
00036         interfaceMode = General::removeWhiteSpace(interfaceMode);
00037 
00038         interfaceMode_ = General::str2Interfacemode(interfaceMode,
00039                         General::MONITOR);
00040 
00041         // monitor can not be connected to another monitor so its an error
00042         if (interfaceMode_ == General::MONITOR) {
00043                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Invalid interfaceMode specified in "
00044                                 "spirit:monitor"));
00045         }
00046 
00047         // get the monitor group element
00048         for (int i = 0; i < monitorNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00049                 if (monitorNode.childNodes().at(i).nodeName() == QString(
00050                                 "spirit:group")) {
00051                         group_ = monitorNode.childNodes().at(i).childNodes().at(0).
00052                                         nodeValue();
00053                         group_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(group_);
00054                 }
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 BusInterface::MonitorInterface::MonitorInterface():
00059 interfaceMode_(General::MONITOR),
00060 group_() {
00061 }

00063 // class constructor
00064 BusInterface::BusInterface(QDomNode &busInterface):
00065                                                 nameGroup_(busInterface),
00066                                                 attributes_(),
00067                                                 busType_(), abstractionType_(),
00068                                                 interfaceMode_(General::MODE_UNDEFINED),
00069                                                 connectionRequired_(false), portMaps_(),
00070                                                 bitsInLau_(DEFAULT_BITS_IN_LAU),
00071                                                 bitSteering_(General::BITSTEERING_UNSPECIFIED),
00072                                                 bitSteeringAttributes_(),
00073                                                 endianness_(General::LITTLE),
00074                                                 parameters_(), master_(), slave_(), system_(),
00075                                                 monitor_() {
00076 
00077         // get the attributes for the bus interface
00078         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = busInterface.attributes();
00079         for (int j = 0; j < attributeMap.size(); ++j) {
00080                 QString name = attributeMap.item(j).nodeName();
00081                 QString value = attributeMap.item(j).nodeValue();
00082                 attributes_[name] = value;
00083         }
00084 
00085         // go through all the child nodes and call appropriate constructors
00086         QDomNodeList children = busInterface.childNodes();
00087 
00088         for (int i = 0; i < children.size(); ++i) {
00089 
00090                 // if node is a comment then skip it
00091                 if (children.at(i).isComment())
00092                         continue;
00093 
00094                 // get bus type
00095                 if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:busType")) {
00096 
00097                         QDomNode busTypeNode = children.at(i);
00098 
00099                         // create the vlnv and set a pointer for it
00100                         busType_ = General::createVLNV(busTypeNode, VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 // get abstraction type
00104                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00105                                 QString("spirit:abstractionType")) {
00106                         QDomNode abstractionNode = children.at(i);
00107 
00108                         // create the vlnv and set a pointer for it
00109                         abstractionType_ = General::createVLNV(abstractionNode,
00110                                                         VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION);
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 // get interface mode:
00114 
00115                 // master
00116                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:master")) {
00117                         interfaceMode_ = General::MASTER;
00118                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00119 
00120                         // if one of the other elements are already defined
00121                         if (slave_ || monitor_ || !system_.isNull()) {
00122                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("More than one interfaceMode "
00123                                                 "defined in spirit:busInterface"));
00124                         }
00125                         master_ = QSharedPointer<MasterInterface>(new MasterInterface(
00126                                         tempNode));
00127                 }
00128                 // slave
00129                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:slave")) {
00130                         interfaceMode_ = General::SLAVE;
00131                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00132 
00133                         // if one of the other elements are already defined
00134                         if (master_ || monitor_ || !system_.isNull()) {
00135                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("More than one interfaceMode "
00136                                                 "defined in spirit:busInterface"));
00137                         }
00138                         slave_ = QSharedPointer<SlaveInterface>(new SlaveInterface(
00139                                         tempNode));
00140                 }
00141                 // mirroredMaster
00142                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00143                                 QString("spirit:mirroredMaster")) {
00144                         interfaceMode_ = General::MIRROREDMASTER;
00145                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00146 
00147                         // if one of the other elements are already defined
00148                         if (slave_ || monitor_ || !system_.isNull()) {
00149                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("More than one interfaceMode "
00150                                                 "defined in spirit:busInterface"));
00151                         }
00152                         master_ = QSharedPointer<MasterInterface>(new MasterInterface(
00153                                         tempNode));
00154                 }
00155                 // mirroredSlave
00156                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00157                                 QString("spirit:mirroredSlave")) {
00158                         interfaceMode_ = General::MIRROREDSLAVE;
00159                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00160 
00161                         // if one of the other elements are already defined
00162                         if (master_ || monitor_ || !system_.isNull()) {
00163                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("More than one interfaceMode "
00164                                                 "defined in spirit:busInterface"));
00165                         }
00166                         mirroredSlave_ = QSharedPointer<MirroredSlaveInterface>(
00167                                         new MirroredSlaveInterface(tempNode));
00168                 }
00169                 // system
00170                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:system")) {
00171                         interfaceMode_ = General::SYSTEM;
00172 
00173                         // if one of the other elements are already defined
00174                         if (slave_ || monitor_ || master_) {
00175                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("More than one interfaceMode "
00176                                                 "defined in spirit:busInterface"));
00177                         }
00178 
00179                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00180                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00181                                 if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00182                                                 QString("spirit:group")) {
00183                                         system_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(j).childNodes().at(0).
00184                                                         nodeValue();
00185                                         system_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(system_);
00186                                 }
00187                         }
00188                 }
00189                 // mirroredSystem
00190                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00191                                 QString("spirit:mirroredSystem")) {
00192                         interfaceMode_ = General::MIRROREDSYSTEM;
00193 
00194                         // if one of the other elements are already defined
00195                         if (slave_ || monitor_ || master_) {
00196                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("More than one interfaceMode "
00197                                                 "defined in spirit:busInterface"));
00198                         }
00199 
00200                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00201                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00202                                 if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00203                                                 QString("spirit:group")) {
00204                                         system_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(j).childNodes().at(0).
00205                                                         nodeValue();
00206                                         system_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(system_);
00207                                 }
00208                         }
00209                 }
00210                 // monitor
00211                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:monitor")) {
00212                         interfaceMode_ = General::MONITOR;
00213 
00214                         // if one of the other elements are already defined
00215                         if (slave_ || !system_.isNull() || master_) {
00216                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("More than one interfaceMode "
00217                                                 "defined in spirit:busInterface"));
00218                         }
00219 
00220                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00221                         monitor_ = QSharedPointer<BusInterface::MonitorInterface>(
00222                                         new BusInterface::MonitorInterface(tempNode));
00223                 }
00224                 // end of interface mode
00225 
00226                 // get connectionRequired
00227                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00228                                 QString("spirit:connectionRequired")) {
00229 
00230                         // if true is found then it is set but false is default value
00231                         QString connection = children.at(i).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00232                         connectionRequired_ = General::str2Bool(connection, false);
00233                 }
00234 
00235                 // get port maps
00236                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:portMaps")) {
00237 
00238                         // call constructors for all port map items
00239                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00240 
00241                                 if (children.at(i).childNodes().at(j).isComment())
00242                                         continue;
00243 
00244                                 // call constructor and give the child node representing the
00245                                 // single choice as parameter
00246                                 QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00247 
00248                                 General::PortMap *temp = new General::PortMap(tempNode);
00249                                 portMaps_.append(QSharedPointer<General::PortMap>(temp));
00250                         }
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 // get bits in lau
00254                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:bitsInLau")) {
00255                         bitsInLau_ = children.at(i).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00256                 }
00257 
00258                 // get bit steering
00259                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:bitSteering")) {
00260                         QString bitSteering = children.at(i).childNodes().at(0).
00261                                         nodeValue();
00262                         bitSteering_ = General::str2BitSteering(bitSteering);
00263 
00264                         // get the attributes for bitSteering element
00265                         QDomNode tempNode = children.at(i);
00266                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, bitSteeringAttributes_);
00267                 }
00268 
00269                 // get endianness
00270                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:endianness")) {
00271                         endianness_ = General::str2Endianness(children.at(i).childNodes().
00272                                         at(0).nodeValue(), General::LITTLE);
00273                 }
00274 
00275                 // get parameters
00276                 else if (children.at(i).nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00277 
00278                         // go through all parameters
00279                         for (int j = 0; j < children.at(i).childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00280 
00281                                 QDomNode parameterNode = children.at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00282                                 Parameter *temp = new Parameter(parameterNode);
00283                                 parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(temp));
00284                         }
00285                 }
00286         }
00287 
00288         // if mandatory elements are missing
00289         if (!busType_.isValid()) {
00290                 throw Parse_error(QString("Mandatory element spirit:busType missing"
00291                                 " in spirit:busInterface"));
00292         }
00293 
00294         if (nameGroup_.name_.isNull()) {
00295                 throw Parse_error(QString("Mandatory element spirit:name missing"
00296                                 " in spirit:busInterface"));
00297         }
00298         return;
00299 }

00315 BusInterface::BusInterface( const BusInterface &other ):
00316 nameGroup_(other.nameGroup_),
00317 attributes_(other.attributes_),
00318 busType_(other.busType_),
00319 abstractionType_(other.abstractionType_),
00320 interfaceMode_(other.interfaceMode_),
00321 connectionRequired_(other.connectionRequired_),
00322 portMaps_(),
00323 bitsInLau_(other.bitsInLau_),
00324 bitSteering_(other.bitSteering_),
00325 bitSteeringAttributes_(other.bitSteeringAttributes_),
00326 endianness_(other.endianness_),
00327 parameters_(),
00328 master_(),
00329 slave_(),
00330 system_(other.system_),
00331 monitor_(),
00332 mirroredSlave_() {
00333 
00334         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, other.portMaps_) {
00335                 if (portMap) {
00336                         QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> copy = QSharedPointer<General::PortMap>(
00337                                 new General::PortMap(*portMap.data()));
00338                         portMaps_.append(copy);
00339                 }
00340         }
00341 
00342         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00343                 if (param) {
00344                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00345                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00346                         parameters_.append(copy);
00347                 }
00348         }
00349 
00350         if (other.master_) {
00351                 master_ = QSharedPointer<MasterInterface>(
00352                         new MasterInterface(*other.master_.data()));
00353         }
00354 
00355         if (other.slave_) {
00356                 slave_ = QSharedPointer<SlaveInterface>(
00357                         new SlaveInterface(*other.slave_.data()));
00358         }
00359 
00360         if (other.monitor_) {
00361                 monitor_ = QSharedPointer<MonitorInterface>(
00362                         new MonitorInterface(*other.monitor_.data()));
00363         }
00364 
00365         if (other.mirroredSlave_) {
00366                 mirroredSlave_ = QSharedPointer<MirroredSlaveInterface>(
00367                         new MirroredSlaveInterface(*other.mirroredSlave_));
00368         }
00369 }

00371 BusInterface & BusInterface::operator=( const BusInterface &other ) {
00372         if (this != &other) {
00373         
00374                 nameGroup_ = other.nameGroup_;
00375                 attributes_ = other.attributes_;
00376                 busType_ = other.busType_;
00377                 abstractionType_ = other.abstractionType_;
00378                 interfaceMode_ = other.interfaceMode_;
00379                 connectionRequired_ = other.connectionRequired_;
00380                 bitsInLau_ = other.bitsInLau_;
00381                 bitSteering_ = other.bitSteering_;
00382                 bitSteeringAttributes_ = other.bitSteeringAttributes_;
00383                 endianness_ = other.endianness_;
00384                 system_ = other.system_;
00385 
00386                 portMaps_.clear();
00387                 foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, other.portMaps_) {
00388                         if (portMap) {
00389                                 QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> copy = QSharedPointer<General::PortMap>(
00390                                         new General::PortMap(*portMap.data()));
00391                                 portMaps_.append(copy);
00392                         }
00393                 }
00394 
00395                 parameters_.clear();
00396                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00397                         if (param) {
00398                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00399                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00400                                 parameters_.append(copy);
00401                         }
00402                 }
00403 
00404                 if (other.master_) {
00405                         master_ = QSharedPointer<MasterInterface>(
00406                                 new MasterInterface(*other.master_.data()));
00407                 }
00408                 else
00409                         master_ = QSharedPointer<MasterInterface>();
00410 
00411 
00412                 if (other.slave_) {
00413                         slave_ = QSharedPointer<SlaveInterface>(
00414                                 new SlaveInterface(*other.slave_.data()));
00415                 }
00416                 else
00417                         slave_ = QSharedPointer<SlaveInterface>();
00418 
00419                 if (other.monitor_) {
00420                         monitor_ = QSharedPointer<MonitorInterface>(
00421                                 new MonitorInterface(*other.monitor_.data()));
00422                 }
00423                 else
00424                         monitor_ = QSharedPointer<MonitorInterface>();
00425 
00426                 if (other.mirroredSlave_) {
00427                         mirroredSlave_ = QSharedPointer<MirroredSlaveInterface>(
00428                                 new MirroredSlaveInterface(*other.mirroredSlave_));
00429                 }
00430                 else
00431                         mirroredSlave_ = QSharedPointer<MirroredSlaveInterface>();
00432 
00433         }
00434         return *this;
00435 }

00437 // the destructor
00438 BusInterface::~BusInterface() {
00439         portMaps_.clear();
00440         bitSteeringAttributes_.clear();
00441         parameters_.clear();
00442         master_.clear();
00443         slave_.clear();
00444         monitor_.clear();

00446 
00447 void BusInterface::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00448         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:busInterface");
00449 
00450         if (!attributes_.isEmpty())
00451                 General::writeAttributes(writer, attributes_);
00452 
00453         // if mandatory element name is empty
00454         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty()) {
00455                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00456                                 "spirit:busInterface"));
00457         }
00458         else {
00459                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", nameGroup_.name_);
00460         }
00461 
00462         if (!nameGroup_.displayName_.isEmpty())
00463                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", nameGroup_.displayName_);
00464 
00465         if (!nameGroup_.description_.isEmpty())
00466                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", nameGroup_.description_);
00467 
00468         // if mandatory element busType is missing
00469         if (!busType_.isValid()) {
00470                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element busType missing in "
00471                                 "spirit:busInterface"));
00472         }
00473         // if bus type is found its written
00474         else {
00475                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:busType");
00476                 General::writeVLNVAttributes(writer, &busType_);
00477         }
00478 
00479         // if optional abstraction type is found
00480         if (abstractionType_.isValid()) {
00481                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:abstractionType");
00482                 General::writeVLNVAttributes(writer, &abstractionType_);
00483         }
00484 
00485         // write the interface mode
00486         switch (interfaceMode_) {
00487         case General::MASTER: {
00488                 if (master_) {
00489                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:master");
00490                         master_->write(writer);
00491                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:master
00492                 }
00493                 else {
00494                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Interface mode is set to master "
00495                                         "but spirit:master element is not defined"));
00496                 }
00497                 break;
00498         }
00499         case General::SLAVE: {
00500                 if (slave_) {
00501                         slave_->write(writer);
00502                 }
00503                 else {
00504                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Interface mode is set to slave "
00505                                         "but spirit:slave element is not defined"));
00506                 }
00507                 break;
00508         }
00509         case General::SYSTEM: {
00510                 if (!system_.isEmpty()) {
00511                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:system");
00512                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:group", system_);
00513                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:system
00514                 }
00515                 else {
00516                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Interface mode is set to system "
00517                                         "but spirit:system element is not defined"));
00518                 }
00519                 break;
00520         }
00521         case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00522                 if (master_) {
00523                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:mirroredMaster");
00524                         master_->write(writer);
00525                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:mirroredMaster
00526                 }
00527                 else {
00528                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Interface mode is set to master "
00529                                         "but spirit:master element is not defined"));
00530                 }
00531                 break;
00532         }
00533         case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00534                 if (mirroredSlave_) {
00535                         mirroredSlave_->write(writer);
00536                 }
00537                 else {
00538                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Interface mode is set to "
00539                                         "mirroredSlave but spirit:mirroredSlave element is not "
00540                                         "defined"));
00541                 }
00542                 break;
00543         }
00544         case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00545                 if (!system_.isEmpty()) {
00546                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:mirroredSystem");
00547                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:group", system_);
00548                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:system
00549                 }
00550                 else {
00551                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Interface mode is set to "
00552                                         "mirroredSystem but spirit:system element is not defined"));
00553                 }
00554                 break;
00555         }
00556         case General::MONITOR: {
00557                 if (monitor_) {
00558                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:monitor");
00559 
00560                         // monitor can't be connected to another monitor
00561                         if (monitor_->interfaceMode_ == General::MONITOR) {
00562                                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("InterfaceMode of a monitor can"
00563                                                 " not be monitor"));
00564                         }
00565                         else {
00566                                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:interfaceMode",
00567                                                 General::interfaceMode2Str(monitor_->interfaceMode_));
00568                         }
00569 
00570                         // if mandatory group is defined
00571                         if (!monitor_->group_.isEmpty()) {
00572                                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:group", monitor_->group_);
00573                         }
00574                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:monitor
00575                 }
00576                 break;
00577         }
00578         default: {
00579                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Interface mode was not of supported"
00580                                 " type"));
00581         }
00582         }
00583 
00584         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:connectionRequired",
00585                         General::bool2Str(connectionRequired_));
00586 
00587         // if portMaps are defined
00588         if (portMaps_.size() != 0) {
00589                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:portMaps");
00590 
00591                 // write each port map
00592                 for (int i = 0; i < portMaps_.size(); ++i) {
00593                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:portMap");
00594 
00595                         // if logical name of the port is missing
00596                         if (portMaps_.at(i)->logicalPort_.isEmpty()) {
00597                                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing"
00598                                                 " in spirit:logicalPort"));
00599                         }
00600                         else {
00601                                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:logicalPort");
00602                                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name",
00603                                                 portMaps_.at(i)->logicalPort_);
00604 
00605                                 // if a logical vector is defined
00606                                 if (portMaps_.value(i)->logicalVector_) {
00607                                         portMaps_.value(i)->logicalVector_->write(writer);
00608                                 }
00609                                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:logicalPort
00610                         }
00611 
00612                         // if physical name of the port is missing
00613                         if (portMaps_.at(i)->physicalPort_.isEmpty()) {
00614                                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing"
00615                                                 " in spirit:physicalPort"));
00616                         }
00617                         else {
00618                                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:physicalPort");
00619                                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name",
00620                                                 portMaps_.at(i)->physicalPort_);
00621 
00622                                 // if a physical vector is defined
00623                                 if (portMaps_.value(i)->physicalVector_) {
00624                                         portMaps_.value(i)->physicalVector_->write(writer);
00625                                 }
00626 
00627                                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:physicalPort
00628                         }
00629 
00630                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:portMap
00631                 }
00632 
00633                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:portMaps
00634         } // portMaps have been written now
00635 
00636         // write the bits in lau always
00637         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:bitsInLau", QString::number(bitsInLau_));
00638 
00639         // if the bitSteering has been defined
00640         if (bitSteering_ != General::BITSTEERING_UNSPECIFIED) {
00641 
00642                 // start the spirit:bitSteering tag
00643                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:bitSteering");
00644 
00645                 // write the attributes for the element
00646                 General::writeAttributes(writer, bitSteeringAttributes_);
00647 
00648                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00649                 writer.writeCharacters(General::bitSteering2Str(bitSteering_));
00650                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:bitSteering
00651         }
00652 
00653         // always write the endianness part
00654         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:endianness",
00655                         General::endianness2Str(endianness_));
00656 
00657         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00658                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00659 
00660                 // write each parameter
00661                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00662                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00663                 }
00664                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00665         }
00666 
00667         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:busInterface
00668 }
00669

00671         return bitSteering_;

00758 void BusInterface::setInterfaceMode(General::InterfaceMode interfaceMode) {
00759         interfaceMode_ = interfaceMode;
00760 
00761         // clear the elements that dont belong to the selected interface mode
00762         switch (interfaceMode_) {
00763                 case General::MASTER: {
00764                         monitor_.clear();
00765                         slave_.clear();
00766                         system_.clear();
00767                         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00768                         if (!master_)
00769                                 master_ = QSharedPointer<MasterInterface>(new MasterInterface());
00770                         return;
00771                                                           }
00772                 case General::SLAVE: {
00773                         monitor_.clear();
00774                         master_.clear();
00775                         system_.clear();
00776                         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00777                         if (!slave_)
00778                                 slave_ = QSharedPointer<SlaveInterface>(new SlaveInterface());
00779                         return;
00780                                                          }
00781                 case General::SYSTEM: {
00782                         monitor_.clear();
00783                         slave_.clear();
00784                         master_.clear();
00785                         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00786                         return;
00787                                                           }
00788                 case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00789                         monitor_.clear();
00790                         slave_.clear();
00791                         master_.clear();
00792                         system_.clear();
00793                         if (!mirroredSlave_)
00794                                 mirroredSlave_ = QSharedPointer<MirroredSlaveInterface>(
00795                                 new MirroredSlaveInterface());
00796                         return;
00797                                                                          }
00798                 case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00799                         monitor_.clear();
00800                         slave_.clear();
00801                         system_.clear();
00802                         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00803                         if (!master_)
00804                                 master_ = QSharedPointer<MasterInterface>(new MasterInterface()); 
00805                         return;
00806                                                                           }
00807                 case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00808                         monitor_.clear();
00809                         slave_.clear();
00810                         master_.clear();
00811                         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00812                         return;
00813                                                                           }
00814                 case General::MONITOR: {
00815                         slave_.clear();
00816                         master_.clear();
00817                         system_.clear();
00818                         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00819                         if (!monitor_)
00820                                 monitor_ = QSharedPointer<MonitorInterface>(new MonitorInterface());
00821                         return;
00822                                                            }
00823                 default: {
00824                         monitor_.clear();
00825                         slave_.clear();
00826                         master_.clear();
00827                         system_.clear();
00828                         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00829                         return;
00830                                  }
00831         }
00832 }

00843 void BusInterface::setMonitor(MonitorInterface* monitor) {
00844         // remove all old interfaceTypes
00845         monitor_.clear();
00846         slave_.clear();
00847         master_.clear();
00848         system_.clear();
00849         mirroredSlave_.clear();
00850 
00851         // change interface type and save new instance
00852         interfaceMode_ = General::MONITOR;
00853         monitor_ = QSharedPointer<MonitorInterface>(monitor);
00854         return;
00855 }

00931 bool BusInterface::hasBridge() const {
00932 
00933     if (!slave_)
00934         return false;
00935         // does the slave interface have bridge defined
00936         return slave_->hasBridge();
00937 }

00963 QStringList BusInterface::getPhysicalPortNames() const {
00964         // add each physical port name to the list
00965         QStringList list;
00966         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, portMaps_) {
00967                 list.append(portMap->physicalPort_);
00968         }
00969         return list;
00970 }

00973 QStringList BusInterface::getLogicalPortNames() const {
00974         // add each logical port name to the list
00975         QStringList list;
00976         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, portMaps_) {
00977                 list.append(portMap->logicalPort_);
00978         }
00979         return list;

00983 
00984 bool BusInterface::hasLogicalPort( const QString& logicalPortName ) const {
00985 
00986         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, portMaps_) {
00987                 
00988                 // if the port map contains the searched logical port.
00989                 if (portMap->logicalPort_.compare(logicalPortName) == 0) {
00990                         return true;
00991                 }
00992         }
00993 
00994         // if no logical port with given name was found.
00995         return false;
00996 }
00997 
00998 
00999 bool BusInterface::hasPhysicalPort( const QString& physicalPortName ) const {
01000         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, portMaps_) {
01001 
01002                 // if the port map contains the searched logical port.
01003                 if (portMap->physicalPort_.compare(physicalPortName) == 0) {
01004                         return true;
01005                 }
01006         }
01007 
01008         // if no logical port with given name was found.
01009         return false;
01010 }
01011 
01012 QString BusInterface::getLogicalPortName( const QString& physicalPortName ) const {
01013         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, portMaps_) {
01014 
01015                 // if the port map contains the searched physical port.
01016                 if (portMap->physicalPort_.compare(physicalPortName) == 0) {
01017                         return portMap->logicalPort_;
01018                 }
01019         }
01020 
01021         // if no physical port with given name was found.
01022         return QString();
01023 }

01025 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01026 // Function: setMCAPIPortID()
01027 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01028 void BusInterface::setMCAPIPortID(int portID)
01029 {
01030     // Try to replace the old one if it already exists.
01031     foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, parameters_)
01032     {
01033         if (param->getName() == "kts_port_id")
01034         {
01035             param->setValue(QString::number(portID));
01036             return;
01037         }
01038     }
01039 
01040     // Otherwise create a new parameter.
01041     QSharedPointer<Parameter> param(new Parameter());
01042     param->setName("kts_port_id");
01043     param->setValue(QString::number(portID));
01044     parameters_.append(param);
01045 }
01046 
01047 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01048 // Function: getMCAPIPortID()
01049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01050 int BusInterface::getMCAPIPortID() const
01051 {
01052     foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, parameters_)
01053     {
01054         if (param->getName() == "kts_port_id")
01055         {
01056             return param->getValue().toInt();
01057         }
01058     }
01059 
01060     return -1;
01061 }
